rawMetadata: {"compiler":{"version":"0.8.26+commit.8a97fa7a"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"hooks","type":"address"}],"name":"HookAddressNotValid","type":"error"},{"inputs":[],"name":"HookDeltaExceedsSwapAmount","type":"error"},{"inputs":[],"name":"InvalidHookResponse","type":"error"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"hook","type":"address"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"revertReason","type":"bytes"}],"name":"Wrap__FailedHookCall","type":"error"}],"devdoc":{"errors":{"HookAddressNotValid(address)":[{"params":{"hooks":"The address of the hooks contract"}}],"Wrap__FailedHookCall(address,bytes)":[{"params":{"revertReason":"bubbled up revert reason"}}]},"kind":"dev","methods":{},"version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"HookAddressNotValid(address)":[{"notice":"Thrown if the address will not lead to the specified hook calls being called"}],"HookDeltaExceedsSwapAmount()":[{"notice":"The hook's delta changed the swap from exactIn to exactOut or vice versa"}],"InvalidHookResponse()":[{"notice":"Hook did not return its selector"}],"Wrap__FailedHookCall(address,bytes)":[{"notice":"thrown when a hook call fails"}]},"kind":"user","methods":{},"notice":"V4 decides whether to invoke specific hooks by inspecting the lowest significant bits of the address that the hooks contract is deployed to.
